relation: CONSTRUCTing illegal triples should be optional
Inconsistancy between documentation and conformance tests with respect to STRBEFORE() & STRAFTER()
FROM and FROM NAMED: To fetch or not to fetch?

Default and named datasets in federated queries

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {19438=This section is all the comments in the following sections that are marked "Open" as of 2012-05-29., 35431=See Comments_2012-05-29 for all comments in the consolidation.}
textBeforeTable: Comments after decision Oct-2012 for CR/PR Current policy is to write proposed response in the wiki (below), send to WG mailing list, wait 2-3 business days, get some +1s from the WG, then reply. Status: should be "open", "Response sent", "ACK", "ACK - OK", or "ACK - NOT OK". Response: links to response email and to subsequent acknowledgment from commenter Owner: WG member who is addressing issues and/or drafting response email Key to columns Comments to SPARQL documents 1.4 Consolidation of 2012-05-29 1.3 Comments received after 2012-05-29 Consolidation 1.2 Comments for query 3LC 1.1 Comments after decision Oct-2012 for CR/PR 1 Comments to SPARQL documents Contents search navigation, Jump to: From SPARQL Working Group Comments
